column5: Very nice private room located in a charming Heights bungalow. Bright and quiet facing the backyard. En-suite bath with private access (from the side of the house). Room is connected to the main house; door is kept locked and you have your own key. Few blocks from White Oak with many restaurants and bars. A designer bed, antique bath! Free wifi. Host is available to answer questions on phone, and when home. Flexible check-in time. Please note this is hotel like (microwave, tea and coffee).
column8: private room, en-suite in quaint Heights bungalow
